function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of infectious disease transmission in built environments due to changes in living style and architecture.","Impact":"Uncontrolled transmission of contagious diseases can lead to widespread illness and public health crises.","Mitigation":"Implementing design and construction standards that prioritize health and hygiene, air and water quality, and energy efficiency in residential buildings.","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air purification technologies, and smart building management systems.","People":"Residents, construction professionals, architects, urban planners, public health officials.","Owner":"Architects, builders, government agencies, public health organizations."}]}
